overview: Two strangers find themselves next to each other in the subway. Due to a coincidence, the girl feels dislike and curiosity towards the boy who sits next to her and eats her cookies with her. However, when she realizes that in reality everything is the opposite, the time cannot be turned back.  Based on the story of Tymofii Kuzyshchyn "Accident at the Airport".
title: Happiness Takes No Account of Time
